lead_paragraph: FIFA's ethics judges announced on Thursday they had opened formal proceedings against suspended Secretary General Jerome Valcke over alleged corruption involving World Cup ticket sales, one of many scandals now surrounding football's governing body.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Ethics Judges Announce Proceedings Against Valcke
headline.main: FIFA Ethics Judges Announce Proceedings Against Valcke
